column3:
A dungeon or trial will be selected at random from among those you have unlocked. Successful completion will earn you far greater rewards.

\xe2\x80\xbbBonus EXP and gil will be awarded to compensate for the discrepancy between character and duty levels. A further percentage will then be added based on character level.
\xe2\x80\xbbThe amount of bonus company seals awarded is determined by class/job level.
\xe2\x80\xbbAllagan tomestones are only awarded to level 50 characters.
\xe2\x80\xbbThe standard reward for this duty roulette category and all related bonuses are available once per day. The adventurer in need" reward is always available."
column4: Duty Type: Light Party Dungeons & Trials

column3:
A high-level dungeon will be selected at random from among those you have unlocked. Successful completion will earn you far greater rewards.

\xe2\x80\xbbBonus gil will be awarded to compensate for the discrepancy between character and duty levels. A further percentage will then be added based on character level.
\xe2\x80\xbbThe standard reward for this duty roulette category and all related bonuses are available once per day. The adventurer in need" reward is always available.
\xe2\x80\xbbJoining this duty as a party will nullify any "adventurer in need" bonus."
column4: Duty Type: High-level Light Party Dungeons

column3:
